overview: Two ambitious hapless guys were forced to have a lot of debts due to gambling. During a luxury car theft, they accidentally got a valuable treasure - a blue and white porcelain vase. Then the two contacted Tonygo and met. Meet at a gym to get this treasure. In order to buy a batch of "counterfeit coins", Brother Heibo Shiban also made an appointment with Tonigo to trade on the same day, but Tonigo had another "urgency" that day and hurriedly left. After the two gangs came to the fitness room, they mistaken the owner of the gym for Tony Ge.
title: Crazy Deal
